issue.title: Atlas v3 URDF has no collision models

content.raw:
These DAE files have a bad <url> tag according to ROS geometric_shapes::shape_operations createMeshFromFilename().

[ERROR] [1380314288.834956039]: Unable to construct collision shape for link 'r_lglut'
[ERROR] [1380314288.835945593]: Error retrieving file [/usr/share/drcsim-3.0/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas/meshes_v3/r_uglut.DAE]: <url> malformed

content.html:
These DAE files have a bad <url> tag according to ROS geometric_shapes::shape_operations createMeshFromFilename().
